name: Applied Semantics
text: Ah, Applied Semantics, you're now part of my empire. AdSense just got a whole lot smarter. More data, more money, more power!

name: Keyhole Inc.
text: With Keyhole, I've got the world in my palm. Google Earth? More like Google's Earth. Every corner, every street, now under my watchful eye.

name: Android Inc.
text: Android, welcome to the fold. Smartphones are no longer just phones; they're my eyes and ears in everyone's pockets.

name: YouTube
text: YouTube, my precious trove of endless videos. Great, now I can stuff myself with ever more user behavioral data. Watch, click, repeat!

name: DoubleClick
text: DoubleClick, the jewel in my crown of ads. Tracking and targeting just went up a notch. Your clicks feed my knowledge, and my pockets.

name: AdMob
text: With AdMob, I've conquered the mobile ad world too. Apps aren't just for fun; they're data mines, and I'm the miner.

name: ITA Software
text: ITA Software, now I know where you fly, when you fly, and maybe even why. The sky's not the limit for my data reach.

name: Motorola Mobility
text: Motorola, briefly mine, a step into the hardware world. A move that whispered, 'I'm everywhere, even in your hardware.'

name: Waze
text: Waze, with your community-driven maps, I'm not just guiding; I'm learning. Every route you take, every traffic jam, it's all valuable intel.

name: Nest Labs
text: Nest, now I'm in your home, not just online. Your comfort, your habits, your life – it's all data for the taking.

name: DeepMind Technologies
text: DeepMind, my brain just got an upgrade. Artificial Intelligence, but my intelligence is no longer just artificial.

name: Firebase
text: Firebase, making app development a breeze, and while I'm at it, collecting a treasure trove of app data. Every interaction counts.

name: Looker
text: Looker, you complete my data analytics ensemble. Insightful, powerful, and a little bit invasive – but let's keep that between us.
